messages.subject: Alphabet Soup:  the 2009 Calgary Unschooling Conference

messages.messageBody:
Some of you have heard about the Alphabet Soup: 2009 Calgary
Unschooling Conference I'm hosting this September 18-20, 2009. I'm
so excited to announce that a splash page for my website has just
gone live!

http://www.alphabetsoupconference.com/

A fleshed out site, with online registration, links to our Alphabet
Soup yahoo discussion group and more information about our speakers
and about unschooling will be progressing over the next few weeks,
with e-commerce, (for registration and book buying) going live by
March 16.

For now, our yahoo discussion group is already operational:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/AlphabetSoupConference/

Check back regularly to not miss out on any details. This *will* be
a sell out conference. If you're interested in attending, make sure
you register early!

cindy
